channel.title: Need help adding codes with using objects on items ex:chisel on ruby
channel.description: Ok its been a while since i was last coding my server then i deleted it. But anyways in my old server i had alot of using chisels on different gems and stuff, simple things like that. Say you'd use a chisel on a sapphire it would cut the sapphire have the animation and make it into (replaceitem) with a ammulet of magic. Same goes for using a tinderbox on logs and it would make a fire. I totally forgot how to do this so can anyone please help me and make a code? Any help would be appreciated thanks!
